s0151: The Son of Heaven said: 'Recently the Yellow River flooded, years of poor harvests, therefore toured and sacrificed to Houtu, prayed for the common people to grow grain.
s0152: This year abundant harvest has not yet been reported, why would the ding emerge?'
s0153: The officials all said: 'We have heard that in ancient times the Great Thearch raised a divine ding, one means unified, the end to which heaven, earth, and the ten thousand things are bound.
s0154: Huangdi made precious tripods three, representing heaven, earth, and man.
s0155: Yu gathered the metals of the nine provinces, cast nine tripods, all tested cooking for the Supreme Thearch and ghosts and spirits.
s0156: When sages appear, they rise, moved to Xia and Shang.
s0157: Zhou virtue declined, Song's altar perished, the tripods then sank and were not seen.
s0158: The ode says 'From hall to foundation, from sheep to ox;
s0159: Great tripods and small tripods, without excess without deficiency, what great good.'
s0160: Now the tripod reaches Ganquan, luminous and moist dragon-like transformation, receiving blessings without bound.
s0161: Uniting with Zhongshan, yellow and white clouds descend covering, like beasts as omens, foot bows and mounted arrows gathered at the altar below, responding to the great sacrifice and feast.
s0162: 唯陛下有聖德，為一統，宣錫之兆。'
s0163: The Son of Heaven said: 'Not yet.'
s0164: That year, the emperor toured Yongzhou.
s0165: Second year, the emperor toured Yizhou.
s0166: Third year, the emperor toured Yanzhou.
s0167: Fourth year, the emperor toured Jingzhou.
s0168: Fifth year, the emperor toured Yangzhou.
s0169: Sixth year, the emperor toured Qingzhou.
s0170: Seventh year, the emperor toured Xuzhou.
s0171: Eighth year, the emperor toured Youzhou.
s0172: Ninth year, the emperor toured Bingzhou.
s0173: Tenth year, the emperor toured Jizhou.
s0174: Eleventh year, the emperor toured Liangzhou.
s0175: Twelfth year, the emperor toured Yongzhou.
s0176: Thirteenth year, the emperor toured Yizhou.
s0177: Fourteenth year, the emperor toured Yanzhou.
s0178: Fifteenth year, the emperor toured Jingzhou.
s0179: Sixteenth year, the emperor toured Yangzhou.
s0180: Seventeenth year, the emperor toured Qingzhou.
s0181: Eighteenth year, the emperor toured Xuzhou.
s0182: Nineteenth year, the emperor toured Youzhou.
s0183: Twentieth year, the emperor toured Bingzhou.
s0184: Twenty-first year, the emperor toured Jizhou.
s0185: Twenty-second year, the emperor toured Liangzhou.
s0186: Twenty-third year, the emperor toured Yongzhou.
s0187: Twenty-fourth year, the emperor toured Yizhou.
s0188: Twenty-fifth year, the emperor toured Yanzhou.
s0189: Twenty-sixth year, the emperor toured Jingzhou.
s0190: Twenty-seventh year, the emperor toured Yangzhou.
s0191: Twenty-eighth year, the emperor toured Qingzhou.
s0192: Twenty-ninth year, the emperor toured Xuzhou.
s0193: Thirtieth year, the emperor toured Youzhou.
s0194: Thirty-first year, the emperor toured Bingzhou.
s0195: Thirty-second year, the emperor toured Jizhou.
s0196: Thirty-third year, the emperor toured Liangzhou.
s0197: Thirty-fourth year, the emperor toured Yongzhou.
s0198: Thirty-fifth year, the emperor toured Yizhou.
s0199: Thirty-sixth year, the emperor toured Yanzhou.
s0200: Thirty-seventh year, the emperor toured Jingzhou.
